name: ScreenEvent.PotionSizeEvent
description: Fired to determine whether to render the potion indicators in the inventory screen in compact or classic mode. This event is not cancelable and has a result. Event.Result.ALLOW - forcibly renders the potion indicators in compact mode. Event.Result.DEFAULT - defaults to vanilla behavior to using compact mode if the the screen width is too small for classic rendering of potion indicators. Event.Result.DENY - forcibly renders the potion indicators in classic mode. This event is fired on the main Forge event bus , only on the logical client .
